quotes.quote: Love yourself. It is important to stay positive because beauty comes from the inside out.
quotes.author: Jenn Proske

quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: The art of communication is the language of leardership.
quotes.author: James Humes

quotes.quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Laziness is nothing more than the habit of resting before you get tired.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin
